Docs.summary: A list of statements in the MemoryStore.
Docs.value: A list of the s in the store.

Docs.param: A StatementSource, the contents of which are read into the memory store.
Docs.summary: Creates a new MemoryStore and reads the data from a StatementSource, which might be an RdfReader, for instance.
A store of statements held in memory.
Docs.remarks: In addition to an array of statements, the statements are indexed by subject and object to speed Select queries.
